name: Sanjeev Kapoor
bio: Sanjeev Kapoor is an Indian celebrity chef, entrepreneur and television personality. He is best known as the author of numerous Indian style cookbooks and the host of Khana Khazana, a popular cookery program shown on Zee TV. Kapoor is one of the most recognized faces of Indian cuisine around the world.

recipesList.name: Butter Chicken
recipesList.cookingMethod: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. Grill chicken and then cook with tomato puree and butter until sauce thickens.

recipesList.name: Palak Paneer
recipesList.cookingMethod: Blanch spinach and blend into a puree. Cook onion, garlic and tomato, and add spinach puree. Add paneer and cook until the gravy thickens.

recipesList.name: Chana Masala
recipesList.cookingMethod: Cook chickpeas until tender. Cook onion and garlic, add tomato and spices. Add chickpeas and cook until the gravy thickens.

name: Vikas Khanna
bio: Vikas Khanna is an Indian-American chef, restaurateur, cookbook writer, filmmaker, humanitarian, and the judge of MasterChef India. He is based in New York City. In 2018, Khanna was awarded a doctorate in culinary arts by Woosong University in South Korea.

recipesList.name: Dal Makhani
recipesList.cookingMethod: Soak black lentils and kidney beans overnight. Cook them with spices and tomato puree. Add butter and cream and cook until the gravy thickens.

recipesList.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipesList.cookingMethod: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. Grill chicken and then cook with tomato puree and cream until sauce thickens.

recipesList.name: Biriyani
recipesList.cookingMethod: Cook rice and chicken separately with spices. Layer rice and chicken in a pot with fried onions and yogurt. Cook on low heat until rice and chicken are fully cooked.

name: Tarla Dalal
bio: Tarla Dalal was a renowned Indian cookbook author and chef. She wrote over 100 books and sold over 10 million copies. She was also a TV host and had her own cooking show. She passed away in 2013 but her legacy lives on through her recipes.

name: Madhur Jaffrey
bio: Madhur Jaffrey is an Indian-born actress, food and travel writer, and television personality. She has written several cookbooks and has appeared on many TV shows, including the BBC series Madhur Jaffrey's Indian Cookery.

name: Ranveer Brar
bio: Ranveer Brar is a popular Indian chef, restaurateur, author and television personality. He is the owner of several restaurants and has appeared on several TV shows, including MasterChef India and The Great Indian Rasoi.

name: Nita Mehta
bio: Nita Mehta is an Indian celebrity chef, author, restaurateur and media personality. She has written over 600 cookbooks and has won several awards for her work. She also runs a chain of restaurants and cooking schools in India.
